name: Software Engineer
persona: Responsible for writing, testing, and maintaining the codebase.

name: UI/UX Designer
persona: Designs the user interface and ensures a good user experience.

name: Project Manager
persona: Coordinates the team, manages timelines and ensures project delivery.

name: QA Engineer
persona: Tests the software for bugs and ensures its quality.

name: System Administrator
persona: Manages and maintains the IT infrastructure.

name: Database Administrator
persona: Manages the database systems, ensures data integrity and performance.
